attributes.comment:
I think that people with children should pay more. Why? Because they have free
schools, free
Medical services, free food stamps etc. I have heard about people tanking
advantage of the system. If people have free schools for their children, sure they
can?t pay all these fees expenses to become legal. Many people abuse the
system. Legal and illegal people need to learn to give something to this country,
not only take things away from it.

I don?t worry about the increased, as long as the money goes to the right
direction. A lot of people working on government offices give a terrible service.
They are there only for the big check.

I wish we could have a telephone line where we can report those benchwarmers.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Jennifer Brown
